items.content_html: A simple CLI-based Todo application built with Node.js using the Commander package. This app allows you to add todos and read all saved todos from a JSON file. It's designed to be lightweight and easy to use directly from the command line.
items.title: aniketkadale/Nodejs-CLI-Todo: A simple CLI-based Todo application built with Node.js using the Commander package. This app allows you to add todos and read all saved todos from a JSON file. It's designed to be lightweight and easy to use directly from the command line.
